newsitem.title: USA: Research Engineers sees EPS below estimates.
newsitem.headline: Research Engineers sees EPS below estimates.

text.p: Research Engineers Inc said it expects earnings of $0.15 to $0.20 a share for its fiscal year ending March 31, 1997, well below analysts' estimates of $0.36 to $0.43.
It also said in a statement issued Monday that it expects growth in sales and net income for its third and fourth quarters to fall short of analysts' estimates.

"We attribute this slower growth to a longer buying cycle for some of the company's new products on Windows 95 or Windows NT client-server platforms," it said, referring to the computer system on which its products are based.
For fiscal 1997 it expects revenue growth of 40 to 50 percent over the prior year, it said.
The company's initial public stock offering was made in July.
